document.full_text: two of nasa's most experienced spacewalkers floated outside the international space station on sunday for some preventive maintenance to help get the station ready to operate after the shuttle program ends this summer.
document.title: shuttle spacewalkers tackle station maintenance
lines_and_colors: two of nasa's most experienced spacewalkers floated outside the international space station on sunday for some preventive maintenance to help get the station ready to operate after the shuttle program ends this summer.
